PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-17122002-10-030HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the NATIONAL PARKS BUSINESSES REGULATIONS, 1998 by making such adaptations as are required to make them consistent with the Canada National Parks Act, by recognizing other activities in the interpretation of "business", by reinstating the right of appeal where a licence is refused, suspended or revoked, and by explicitly authorizing a park superintendent to issue licences.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0370 Publication Date: 2002-10-23
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the NATIONAL PARKS BUSINESSES REGULATIONS, 1998 by
making such adaptations as are required to make them consistent with the
Canada National Parks Act, by recognizing other activities in the
interpretation of "business", by reinstating the right of appeal where a
licence is refused, suspended or revoked, and by explicitly authorizing a
park superintendent to issue licences.
